  <title>flowline_segments</title>
  <abstract>These are the lines representing the hydrographic "centerlines" of the channels in the Sacramento-SanJoaquin Delta that are representedin the DSM2 model. They have the same start points, end points, and flow direction as the dsm2_channels layer in the DSM2.gdb file geodatabsase.

created to enable calcualtion of channel lengths for the DSM2 model

Digitized using these references: (1) the Delta Hydro Centerlines feature class obtained from Joel Dudas (DWR FESSRO) in April 2010, (2) the National Hydrography Dataset flowlines. These imagery sets were also used: DWR Image Server\Delta2006, DWR Image Server\SFBay2006\DWR Image Server\SuisunMarsh2009.</abstract>
